name: Classic
description: Classical Hollywood movies refer to the films produced during the 'Golden Age' of Hollywood, which spanned from the 1920s to the 1960s. These movies are known for their timeless storytelling, glamorous production values, and iconic stars

name: Comedy
description: Comedy movies are a popular genre known for their ability to make audiences laugh and bring joy. Whether they are slapstick comedies or witty satires, comedy movies provide an escape from everyday life and serve as a source of entertainment and laughter for viewers.

name: Horror
description: Horror movies are a genre that aims to evoke fear, suspense, and a sense of dread in the audience. They often feature elements such as supernatural beings, psychological terror, or gruesome violence.

name: Mystery
description: Mystery movies are a captivating genre that revolves around suspense, puzzles, and the unraveling of enigmatic plotlines. They often involve detective work, unexpected twists, and hidden secrets, keeping audiences guessing until the very end.

name: Western
description: Western films are a genre that typically depicts the American Old West during the 19th century. They often explore themes of rugged individualism, honor, and the clash between civilization and the untamed frontier, presenting stories of cowboys, outlaws, and lawmen in dusty towns, sprawling landscapes, and intense showdowns, capturing the spirit of the Wild West.
